body_text:
Thank you so much for your implementation I shall learn it by heart.



发自我的小米手机
在 Clément Pinard <notifications@github.com>，2018年8月17日 下午6:25写道：

Here is a finished implementation, using the cpp-extension tools to make it installable.

https://github.com/ClementPinard/Pytorch-Correlation-extension

Note that this is still subject to change, as DeviceTensor is not an official interface. In the near future, it will most probably be replaced with what comes from #8366<#8366>

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#4073 (comment)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AZg-LaBe4U1NFOnwMmNjSLrokoga3A-jks5uRpoUgaJpZM4Q5yzx>.
body:
Thank you so much for your implementation I shall learn it by heart.



发自我的小米手机
在 Clément Pinard <notifications@github.com>，2018年8月17日 下午6:25写道：

Here is a finished implementation, using the cpp-extension tools to make it installable.

https://github.com/ClementPinard/Pytorch-Correlation-extension

Note that this is still subject to change, as DeviceTensor is not an official interface. In the near future, it will most probably be replaced with what comes from #8366<https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8366>

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4073#issuecomment-413824035>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AZg-LaBe4U1NFOnwMmNjSLrokoga3A-jks5uRpoUgaJpZM4Q5yzx>.
